ioio.lib.util.android

Class IOIOAndroidApplicationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ioio.lib.util.IOIOBaseApplicationHelper
      • ioio.lib.util.android.IOIOAndroidApplicationHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOIOConnectionManager.IOIOConnectionThreadProvider

    public class IOIOAndroidApplicationHelper
extends IOIOBaseApplicationHelper
    A helper class for creating different kinds of IOIO based applications on Android.

    Note: Consider using IOIOActivity or IOIOService for easy creation of IOIO activities and services. This class is intended for more advanced use-cases not covered by them.

    This class implements a common life-cycle for Android applications interacting with IOIO devices. Usage is as follows:

    • Create an instance of IOIOAndroidApplicationHelper, passing a IOIOLooperProvider and a ContextWrapper to the constructor.
    • Call create(), destroy(), start(), stop() and restart() from the respective Android life-cycle event methods.
    • start() will trigger callback of IOIOLooperProvider.createIOIOLooper(String, Object) for every possible IOIO connection and create a new thread for interacting with this IOIO, through the created IOIOLooper.
    • stop() will make sure proper cleanup and disconnection is done.
